mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stratford
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Frances Benjamin, 1864-1952
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Exterior, view from east. Photographed ca. 1929-1935. Birthplace of Robert E. Lee, Richard Henry Lee, and Francis Lightfoot Lee. Building Date: 18th Century. Westmoreland County, Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Carnegie Survey of the Architecture of the South
